TY Tamil. Its ppl like you that keep TPB alive. So many ppl think TPB is like other torrent sites. It's not. The TPB is about torrents. Not, for you lame ppl that want to burn copies to sell. People like Tamil make it possible for others to take that copy and add english or whatever language is needed. 95% of the new releases come from other countries, not the U.S. The english is always over-layed, not original. A FAKE is a torrent that isn't a watchable movie. Doesn't matter if its a real file; has to be a real download too, not a link. If it is a link, it is FAKE. If you have to pay for it, it's a FAKE. If it is a virus, it's a FAKE. Tamil uploads great cams. People who come to TPB looking for a Perfect, 'theater quality' movie, are idiots. I'm grateful for TPB, people like Tamil, and the many others with skulls who take the 2-3hrs to convert, another 2-3hrs to upload, and whatever other amount of time may be needed. They got their skulls for a reason, their stuff is legit and real. No hidden viruses, no fake rars., no stupidly altered info to make things sound real.  I have a degenerative bone and organ disease. I' don't get out much due to it. My greatest thanks to all who make TPB possible. I'd love to see these movies in theater, but I'm more than happy to accept an, at least, watchable home copy. If I have to wait a week for english, so be it. We all know it will eventually be here.
